WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: The Trump administration] delivered a gut punch to America 's closest allies Thursday , [V: imposing] [ARG1: tariffs on steel and aluminum from Europe , Mexico and Canada] [ARGM-LOC: in a m]
